LanguageData.DE_GatherInfo_UnavailablePawnIsIncapable: Gather info (unavailable, {0} is incapable of social interactions)
LanguageData.DE_HighDemandQuest_LetterBody: One of your colonists found out that one of nearby settlements requires specific supplies and pays much more for them. This can be a good opportunity to make some profitable trades.\n\nCheck quest log for more info.
LanguageData.DE_HighSupplyQuest_LetterBody: One of your colonists found out that one of nearby settlements has excess stocks which it is selling much cheaper now. This can be a good opportunity to make some profitable trades.\n\nCheck quest log for more info.
LanguageData.DE_NoAffectingFactors: Price is not affected by any factors.
LanguageData.DE_ToggleMiningModeCommand_Desc: Switch between light and hard mining modes.
LanguageData.DE_PsiCoinReadyAlert_Explanation: One or more psicoins are waiting to be extracted
LanguageData.DE_Setting_PriceFactor: Price factor drop rate multiplier: x{0}
LanguageData.DE_Setting_PriceFactorHalfed: Currently it takes around {0} for price multipliers to be halved
LanguageData.DE_Setting_GrowthFactor: Price factor growth rate multiplier: x{0}
LanguageData.DE_Setting_GrowthFactorIncreased: Currently it takes around {0} for price multipliers to grow by 0.5
LanguageData.DE_Setting_TechFactor: Price factor for each tech level difference: x{0}
LanguageData.DE_Setting_PlayerEffect: Player's purchases effect on price multipliers: x{0}
LanguageData.DE_Setting_PlayerEffectDouble: Currently it takes {0} silver sent for a thing to double it's price
LanguageData.DE_Setting_SaleEffect: Player's sales effect on price multipliers: x{0}
LanguageData.DE_Setting_SaleEffectHalfed: Currently it takes {0} silver received for a thing to half it's price
LanguageData.DE_Setting_TurnoverDouble: Player's turnover effect on trader's currency amount: x{0}
LanguageData.DE_Setting_TurnoverDoubleInfo: Currently it takes {0} of thing's value to double trader's money
LanguageData.DE_Setting_KeepInMind: Keep in mind that turnover effect drops with time, so actual multiplier for next trader will be less
LanguageData.DE_Setting_TurnoverEffectHalfed: Currently it takes around {0} for currency multiplier to be halved
